div.head: 鼻下赤䘌
div.div: hidden-worms with redness below the nose

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: hidden-worms with redness below the nose

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with bi ni 鼻䘌 , nose with hidden-worms. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Bai bing zhu zhi yao 百病主治藥：黃連同大黃、麝香搽鼻中。末，傅鼻下赤䘌 , “Apply huang lian together with da huang and she xiang to the inside of the nose. The pulver is applied to hidden-worms with redness below the nose ”.
